text: Razzaq Ahmed (born 1 July 1944) is a former Iraqi football forward who played for Iraq in the 1972 AFC Asian Cup qualification. http://niiiis.com/players.html Kamil played for the national team between 1970 and 1974. ==Career statistics== ===International goals=== Scores and results list Iraq's goal tally first. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:100%;" ! title: Razzaq Ahmed
